about_the_game:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.

Whether on the battlefield or holed up at HQ, time is invaluable! And, in order to climb the Chaser Ranks, a chaser needs a razor-sharp edge, or more specifically, a new weapon.
Enter: the Karma DLC.



In order to activate the Missions needed to unlock Karmas (KurtzPel Weapons), you have to grind out the goods, and it’s a long, hard battle.
But, with the Karma DLC, the Karma Missions are unlocked instantaneously!
Purchase the Karma DLC, play the 3, unlocked Missions, and get Karma… It’s that easy.
Additionally, the more Karmas you have at your disposal, the more empowered you will be to create your very own, unique combat combo dynamic!

Included:


- This DLC pack unlocks the 3 missions needed to acquire new Karma
- Use various commands and Karma Crystals for the Karma selected

Missions

- With new missions comes Brand New Monsters, new maps and patterns
(Includes Single/Multi Player and various difficulties)

Hero Chaser: Lime Serenity

- Enter: Hero Chaser Lime Serenity (NPC).
NPCs are the in-game agents that players interface with to acquire Karmas, Missions, Lore and more.
With this DLC purchase, the earnest Lime Serenity becomes immediately available.
Lime Serenity can provide intel about the world of Erthesia and shed light to some of Bellatos' nefarious deeds.


- Increase affinity with Lime Serenity to receive various rewards (Costume, Karma Crystals etc.).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"
